papers.title: Social barriers faced by newcomers placing their first contribution in open source software projects
papers.authors: Steinmacher, I., Silva, M. A., et al.
papers.relevance: Documents how skill development enables newcomers to transition to active contributors

semantic_scholar_match.title: Social Barriers Faced by Newcomers Placing Their First Contribution in Open Source Software Projects
semantic_scholar_match.venue: Conference on Computer Supported Cooperative Work

citations.reasoning: Extensive research on OSS onboarding demonstrates that skill development is essential for transitioning individuals from learning to active contribution.

papers.title: Knowledge collaboration in online communities
papers.authors: Faraj, S., Jarvenpaa, S. L., et al.
papers.relevance: Theoretical framework showing how knowledge transfer enables role advancement

citations.reasoning: Research on knowledge transfer and mentorship demonstrates how these mechanisms prepare contributors for promotion to advanced roles.
